summary: The Increased TSP Access Act of 2025 amends the Food Security Act of 1985 to improve the delivery of technical assistance for conservation practices. Key changes include defining 'approved non-Federal certifying entity,' streamlining the certification process for third-party providers, and establishing payment amounts for their services. The bill also mandates transparency regarding funds obligated to these providers and certification results, aiming to increase capacity and improve conservation efforts through enhanced access and support.
